title: what is the font where the letter "A" looks like a black triangle
content: what is the font where the letter "A" looks like a black triangle and the other letters are pretty much filled in general shapes of them. For instance a u would look like the open part is filled in.
author: cscs

comments.content: Babyteeth has a look similar to what you want

like the font used in 'a clockwork orange' or the cover of wolfmother cds?

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Troy Vera  
Kingdom Graphics  
 [http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209213255/http:/www.kingdomgraphics.biz/ "http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz")

Skype: kingdom\_graphics

i'd bet a dozen bagels it's hand lettered by andy himself. looks like a hybrid of some grotesquely enlarged typewriter type with space-age tweaks.

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Yes ! Stuff close to wolfmother. Do you know any others?
